description: A chemical spill in northern China has drawn attention to growing problems with water use and pollution.
title: Worries Over Water Pollution in China
title_page: Worries Over Water Pollution in China - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 12,
A woman carries clothes in buckets after washing them in a canal next to the Zhang He River near Handan, Hebei Province, China. Northern China has suffered from a drought for decades, and is grappling with how industrial companies, a mainstay of the economy, should operate along rivers.
